citeinfo.origin: Sistemas de Informacin Geogrfica, S.A. de C.V.
citeinfo.title: Mexico Railroads, 2008

serinfo.issue: 2008 World, Europe, United States, Canada, and Mexico

descript.abstract:
Mexico Railroads is a polyline theme representing the major railroads of Mexico. Attribute information includes the length and type of the railroad
This dataset is a part of the 2008 ESRI Data & Maps collection.
descript.purpose: Mexico Railroads provides a base map layer of major railroads within Mexico.
descript.supplinf: Largest scale when displaying the data: 1:400,000.

cntinfo.cntinst:
In the United States: Please direct all inquiries regarding software/data pricing and consulting services to your local ESRI Regional Office. For support, you may contact ESRI Support Center by telephone (voice) between 6:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. Pacific time, Monday through Friday, by dialing 888-377-4575; facsimile (fax) available at 909-792-0960; electronic mail (e-mail) support@esri.com; or visit http://support.esri.com/; ESRI holidays excluded.
Outside the United States Please direct all inquiries regarding software/data pricing, sales, support, and consulting services to your local ESRI International Distributor. This information can be found at http://gis.esri.com/intldist/contact/.
For other questions or comments, you may contact ESRI headquarters by e-mail, telephone, or fax or write to us.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.2.2.1350

dataqual.logic: The shapefile is converted to SDC (Smart Data Compression) format using either ESRI SDC Data Development Kit Professional 2 (DDKP2) or tools in ArcGIS. The SDC data set is then loaded into ArcSDE to verify and validate the geometry.
dataqual.complete: After processing, the data set is checked for drawing display and number of records and file sizes compared with source materials.

horizpa.horizpar: The positional accuracy is not known.

citeinfo.origin: Sistemas de Informacin Geogrfica, S.A. de C.V.
citeinfo.title: Proyecto Mxico Informacin Cartogrfica Digital

pubinfo.publish: Sistemas de Informacin Geogrfica, S.A. de C.V.

procstep.procdesc: The following steps were performed by ESRI: Downloaded the data set (this data set also contains the roads) from the Sistemas de Informacin Geogrfica, S.A. de C.V. FTP site. Removed the road features from the data set. Replaced the attribute OBJETO with the attribute TYPE. Translated the Spanish values to English and put them into the TYPE attribute. Added the attribute KILOMETERS and calculated its values. Removed unneeded attributes. Converted the data set to SDC. Created ArcGIS layer file (.lyr), projection file (.prj), and spatial indices.

enttyp.enttypd: The lines represent the major railroads of Mexico.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

edom.edomvd: The railroad is a single track.

attr.attrdef: The length of the railroad in kilometers.

stdorder.ordering: ESRI Data & Maps is available only as part of ESRI software.

distinfo.techpreq: To use this data requires software that supports SDC files.
